categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Solar Wind Eight was the callsign of an unknown starfighter pilot flying a B-wing starfighter during the Battle of Adumar. The pilot was ordered by Wedge Antilles to join the screen against the TIE Defenders protecting the Imperial capital ships. Later the pilot tagged Tycho Celchu's downed starfighter and transmitted the coordinates to Allegiance for rescue.
